description: This file defines a React component-based layout for a web application using Remix framework, including head metadata, external stylesheets, and layout structure.

methods.name: links
methods.description: Provides array of link objects for preconnections and stylesheet link for Google Fonts.

methods.name: Layout
methods.description: React component that renders the HTML structure including head metadata and body content.
